title: Junior Software Developer, Backend
content:
We’re looking for a Junior Software Developer, Backend who can design, build, test, and ship high quality software that delivers value to our customers. You'll work on a small and agile team, learning how to refine and improve the products that we deliver through continuous feedback and collaboration. Your team will own the entire delivery lifecycle from beta releases to production ready, scalable products suitable for new and existing customers. While working in a hybrid work arrangement, a blend of virtual (in accordance with Hootsuite’s distributed workforce strategy), and in Hootsuite’s Bucharest office, you will report to Manager, Software Development.
WHAT YOU’LL DO: 
Work within a cross-functional team (including designers, product managers, architects and other developers), learning best practices and delivering compelling products and services to our customers
Write, test and deploy high quality scalable code.
Assist with the implementation of our technical roadmap as we scale our services and build new products.
Maintain standards of security, reliability, performance, and quality.
Participate in code reviews, and apply software development best practices.
Learn from the expertise of your peers and work-out-loud to share your experiences internally and within our community.
Work with the following technologies: MongoDB, Elasticsearch, Redis, Docker, Kubernetes, Kafka, GRPC
  
WHAT YOU’LL NEED:
A degree in Computer Science or Engineering, or proven experience developing and maintaining software (including co-op terms and internships).
You are proficient in at least one programming language, ideally Go or Python, and have a desire to learn other languages.
You have been a solid contributor in technical project teams either in a post secondary or work setting.
Knowledge of best practices to ensure high-quality code (i.e. automated tests)
Open Communication: clearly conveys thoughts, both written and verbally, listening attentively and asking questions for clarification and understanding
Collaboration and Teamwork: works with others to deliver results, meaningfully contributing to the team and prioritizing group needs over individual needs
Self Development: is personally committed to, and actively works to continuously improve
Perseverance: pursues everything with energy, drive, and a need to finish—doesn’t give up
 
WHO YOU ARE:
Tenacious. You are determined to succeed, and you are motivated by the success of customers, colleagues, and the community.
Curious. You are always learning and seeking ways to make things better.
Conscientious. You keep your promises, taking your commitments to others seriously, and you have strong integrity.
Humble. You lead with humility and empathy, respecting and learning from the perspectives of others. 
 
In all we do, our six guiding principles light the way:Step Up: Show the world what it looks like to live and work by these guiding principles. #StepUpOne Team: Make Hootsuite a place where everyone feels safe, welcome, valued, and empowered to do their best work without compromising who they are. #OneTeam #FreeToBeMeCustomer Obsessed: Focus relentlessly on helping our customers succeed. #CustomerObsessedGo Fast, Be Agile: Widen our competitive advantage by committing to speed and simplicity over perfection and complexity. #GoFastBeAgilePlay to Win: Commit to building an incredible, profitable company for our customers, our employees, and our stakeholders. #PlayToWin #NoExcusesNeighbours & Allies: Give back to our communities and be an ally. #SocialForGood #Allies
Accommodations will be provided as requested by candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process.

demographic_questions.description:
Hootsuite Inclusion: 

At Hootsuite, we want to build connections that transform: where our people can thrive in a diverse, equitable, and inclusive environment. Below is a set of voluntary demographic questions. If you choose to fill them out, the responses will be used (in aggregate only) to help us identify areas for improvement in our hiring process, including to help us to hire more individuals from underrepresented groups. Your responses, or your choice to not respond, will not be associated with your specific application and will not in any way be used in the hiring decision.

We will be handling information collected about you during the recruitment process in accordance with the Hootsuite Careers Privacy Notice accessible here.

questions.label: I have read the privacy notice, and understand that providing this information is voluntary and will not affect my application process (Required)
I identify my ethnicity as (select all that apply):

answer_options.label: Hispanic or Latinx (including Mexican, Brazilian, Spanish, Cuban, Dominican, and Puerto Rican)
Indigenous (including Indigenous People of Canada, Australia, New Zealand, South America)
North African (including Algerian, Egyptian, Libyan, Moroccan, Tunisian)
South Asian (including Bangladeshi, Bhutanese, Indian, Nepali, Pakistani, Sri Lankan)
Southeast Asian (including Burmese, Cambodian, Filipino, Hmong, Indonesian, Laotian, Malaysian, Mien, Singaporean, Thai, and Vietnamese)
West Asian (including Iranian, Iraqi, Afghan, Cypriots, Israeli, Turkish, Syrian, Lebanese, Saudi Arabian, Yemeni)
East Asian (including Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Mongolian, Tibetan, and Taiwanese)

questions.label: I identify my sexual orientation as:

answer_options.label: Prefer to self-describe in another way

questions.label: I have a disability (select all that apply):

answer_options.label: Legally Blind, Low Vision, partially sighted and or totally Blind
Mobility or Motor Condition (such as Wheelchair user, Amputee, Motor Neurone Disease, Musculoskeletal Problems (incl. back, neck and shoulder), RSI, Osteoarthritis, Cerebral Palsy etc.)
Genetic (such as Cystic Fibrosis, Down Syndrome, Sickle Cell Anemia etc.)
Autoimmune Conditions (such as Multiple Sclerosis, Lupus Erythematosus, Crohn's Disease, Chronic Fatigue Syndrome, Rheumatoid Arthritis etc.)
Speech and language challenges (Non- Verbal Communicators, Expressive language difficulties etc.)
Yes, I have a disability but do not want to provide specifics
No, I don’t have a disability

questions.label: I am neurodiverse (select all that apply):

answer_options.label: No, I don’t have a neurodiversity

questions.description: If you do not have a LinkedIn profile, please write "n/a". We'd love to see your resume instead; please attach!
questions.label: Linkedin Profile URL
Have you ever used a Hootsuite product?
Are you legally eligible to work in the location you are applying for (Romania)?
If you do not live in the location you are applying to, are you willing to relocate?
What are your salary expectations for this position (RON net/month)?
